cause.description:
Pro-Intellectualism United is a non-profit organization founded by Mike LeVine to raise money for Bard College, a pro-intellectual elite liberal arts college in upstate New York.
1. Education is a universal right.
2. Education should be used to expand one's understanding and knowledge about the world around them.
3. Everything should be questioned.
cause.mission: spread intellectualism throughout the adolescent population.
cause.name: Pro-Intellectualism United
